name: Foot-Fall!
description:
Welcome to Foot-Fall! 

This game is more a technical demo of me experimenting with Local Multiplayer, Physical Animations and (boring I am afraid) Carrying Data across scenes such as Usernames.

This project was a lot of fun to make, and I would like to do more to it at somepoint.

Unfortunately due to not having time I had to cut out adding one big feature which was Online Multiplayer, maybe in the future if its requested!

Some Other Features I wanted to add:

  • Being able to change split screen
  • Choosing Team Colour
  • More than 2 Players
  • Username on back of player shirt
  • Goal Celebration Animations
  • AI

I hope you enjoy! Please check out my YouTube to see more projects :)

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCnOcEp-MtXiWJKQ7kunjtMQ?
